# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Boiler and steam engine at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) 
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Make sure to provide fuel for entities that require it, such as burner mining drills and furnaces.
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities that require connection, such as steam engines, are properly connected to other entities.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Make sure to provide source items for entities that are waiting for them, such as burner inserters.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that entities that require electric power, such as electricity groups, are properly plugged into the electric network.

# NAMESPACE
*No utility functions have been defined by the agent.*
*No important variables have been assigned.*
